from vpython import *
import time

ball = sphere(pos=vector(0,0,0), radius=0.5, color=color.blue)
arrow(pos=ball.pos, axis=vector(0,0,0), color=color.yellow)

t = 0
dt = 0.01

while True:
    rate(100)
    ball.pos.x = sin(t)
    ball.pos.y = cos(t)
    arrow.axis = ball.pos - arrow.pos
    t += dt
